name: Erica Fontenot
text: Here on a Saturday night, only 1 server working, and she is doing an awesome job. The dining room is cold, I kept my coat on the entire meal. Food was good and hot. The poor  server was running around by herself,  tables were full of dirty ‚Ä¶More

text: Ordered a meatball pizza today. The meatballs tasted spoiled. Had to throw the whole pizza away. The employees in the pick up area were very nice. The chocolate chip cookie is amazing. Please check your meatballs so nobody gets sick from eating them.

text: A lot of locals are dissatisfied with having to wait a while when picking up their pizza and I‚Äôve heard loads of people complain about poor service... BUT. Pizza Hut makes GREAT pizza and for me personally, I have always enjoyed my service and my pizzas are always just amazing. Keep it up Pizza Hut. You‚Äôre doing just fine

name: Chase Philport
text: Don't get me wrong... I love pizza hut, but my friend and i went and there were 4 dirty tables, the floor was dirty, and they forgot to put sauce on our pizza... Giving this three stars because the waiter was very nice and helpful, and we ‚Ä¶More

text: It took an hour to get our pizz and they weren‚Äôt that busy. They were not cleaning up the tables after people were leaving. So people would be waiting so long to get seated because all the tables were not cleaned off yet. We got Luke warm fries. They also forgot two of our Appetizers. It took forever to get our bill.

name: USS BOOMER
text: My work brings my up here 4-5 times per year. I grab a pizza from this Pizza Hut every time I‚Äôm up here. The pizza is always very good and the young people that work there are always friendly and respectful. Keep it up guys, your batting 1000% with me. :)

text: Having a large family seven, we are always looking for a great inexpensive meal! This Pizza Hut has a fantastic medium Pizza deal. We can order enough for our family and keep it under thirty dollars. The staff are friendly and never seem ‚Ä¶More

name: Kathy Wood
text: 2 bathroom stalls: first one door doesn't latch so I'm not gonna use that..second stall toilet doesn't flush and faucet drains incredibly slow...bathrooms need fixed..ordered our meal and waiter came back to tell us they were out of green peppers...really? Pizza is good though..would've been better with green pepper though.

name: clayton smith
text: Good food way understaffed I was told it was because of corporate rules.... no wonder pizza hut is going extinct.   But I do have to say at this location grant was an excellent server!

text: The man, Justin waited on me was a friendly, happy person, who obviously liked his job.  He was helpful and my pizza was so good.  I also got the cinnamon sticks which were very good.

text: Nice clean facility. I always love their pizza, and their wings are great too.

The hostess got really confused and then looked at us like we were stupid for suggesting it and told us they don't do that.
